title: Craving Buster Fat Bombs
directions: Melt the coconut oil, stir in the cacao and almond butter, and eat right away.
Melt the coconut oil and whisk in the cacao and almond butter until no lumps remain. Spoon ½ tablespoon of the mixture each into 32 small paper muffin cups. .
ingredients: ½ Tbsp melted organic coconut oil
